page.title: 01SEVERN STOKE_ INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area is basically agricultural, with a number of large farms centred on the village of{Severn Stoke.}The only other settlements in the area are the hamlets of{Kinnersley}and{High {Green.}The modern Severn Stoke is a quiet,sleepy area increasingly popular with{commuters}from the city of Worcester. The area is traversed by the{River Severn,}the{A38,}and the{M5 from North-West to South-East. It has had a varied and intresting history, and was originally under the auspices of the{Earl of Coventry.}A focal point for the social life of the area is provided by the Severn Stoke{Country {Club,}and the village hall.The area is also popular with the elderly:there are no less than three{retirement {homes.
